title: Volcanic Age - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Martial Arts   Shounen   Wuxia
tags: Adapted to Manhwa   Age Progression   Ancient China   Archery   Body Tempering   Character Growth   Cultivation   Evil Organizations   Famous Protagonist   Friendship   Hard-Working Protagonist   Hidden Abilities   Hiding True Identity   Inferiority Complex   Late Romance   Leadership   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Loyal Subordinates   Male Protagonist   Manipulative Characters   Mature Protagonist   Mercenaries   Merchants   Multiple Identities   Mythical Beasts   Orphans   Past Plays a Big Role   Proactive Protagonist   Quiet Characters   Revenge   Schemes And Conspiracies   Second Chance   Secret Organizations   Strength-based Social Hierarchy   Sword Wielder   Time Skip   Tragic Past   Tsundere   Underestimated Protagonist   Wars   Weak to Strong   Wealthy Characters
author: Jung Joon Shin
description:
It was an era of war unlike ever seen before in Murim history.

To end the horrible war, numerous heroes had sacrificed their lives and disappeared on the battlefield.

This is the story of a man that longed to be a hero and the story of his brilliant rise to the top.

***

Joo Seo-Cheon is a man who luckily survives the Warring Era and becomes the Hwasan sect’s elder, only to live a life full of regrets and doubts.

He lays on his deathbed waiting for the inevitable when he is returned to the past…>
